title: Freezing computer in game
body: As of yesterday every game I've played involves my entire computer freezing, I've tried re installing and repairing files but nothing has worked. Has this happened to anyone else or does anyone have a fix for this?

replies.body: Have you recently updated Windows 10?  Some players have had freezing issues like this, and the culprit may be an issue with the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Disable that as your first step to fix this.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
Thx, i had the same problem and now its fixed
